entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
